encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: SUNDARAPALLE/SUNDARAPALLE W-B: 11-0 SURVEY: 14/2 HOUSE:11-3/81 EXTENT: 75.556SQ.Yds BUILT: 182SQ. FT Boundires: [N]: THOTTARAMUDI PRASAD [S] KOMMU MUTYALU [E]: ROAD [W]: KOMMU SATYANARAYANA

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No. 135024 of 2022, dated 14/Feb/2022, executed by Government of Andhra Pradesh Rep. By K. Gangavaram Tahsildar, Tanikella Vydyanadha Sarma, in favour of Tatapudi Marie, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 75.5556 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 3-81, comprised in survey number 14-2, situated in Sundarapalle Village and Panchayat, K Gangavaram Mandal, within the District of East Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office T.Sundarapalle is bounded as follows: North by: Thottaramudi Prasad South by: Kommu Mutyalu East by: Road West by: Kommu Satyanarayana
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note It is observed from the recitals of the deed that the SRO Name is mentioned as Sundarapalle, whereas, the document is registered before the SRO Draksharam, it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to verify the same. Further, It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
